SummaryEnglish: Each episode is a DIY instructional How-To explaining the steps I take to crate cosplay props, armor, and rubber monsters

1.TitleEnglish: Build Your Own Warp Scythe (Starcraft II: Legacy of the Void)
1.SummaryEnglish: Forged from the Psi Blade technology of the ancient Templar and infused with Void energy, the Double Headed Staff of the Dark Templar is a very powerful weapon. Now harness your strength into a warp blade of your own with stuff you can find around the house in this DIY video!

2.SummaryEnglish: Odin is back and he's building an incredible Chainsaw Machine Gun from Gears of War!

3.SummaryEnglish: Odin is here to show you how to make your very own Golden Snitch from Harry Potter! It may not be the most Quidditch friendly, but boy is it awesome!

4.SummaryEnglish: We hope you like our take on the Neuralyzer from Men in Black!

5.SummaryEnglish: We are throwing it way back to the classic 1989 Batman movie! This week, Odin takes on the Dark Knight's iconic utility belt

6.SummaryEnglish: This week, Odin takes on one of our most requested DIY's EVER - Fall Out 4's Pip Boy!

7.SummaryEnglish: Need to travel through time and space? We've got you covered! This week Odin will be showing you how build Rick & Morty's very own portal gun.

8.TitleEnglish: Ziggs Bombs from League of Legends
8.SummaryEnglish: Odin takes another loved character from the League of Legends game and show you how to make Zigg's crazy bombs

9.SummaryEnglish: Gotta catch 'em all? We've got you covered! This week Odin will be showing you how build a Pokemon Go Egg Incubator.

10.SummaryEnglish: Any evil dead fans out there? This week Odin shows you how to make the famous chainsaw!

11.TitleEnglish: Cloud's Fusion Sword - Final Fantasy VII
11.SummaryEnglish: This week Odin will be showing you how build Cloud's Fusion Sword from Final Fantasy 7!

16.SummaryEnglish: Watch out - this alien facehugger might bite!

17.TitleEnglish: Make Your Own Combat Ready Lightsaber
17.SummaryEnglish: Odin shows Brittni how to make a combat ready lightsaber. Brittni Barger, Beyond Geek Host Odin Abbott, Odin Makes and DIY Prop Shop Host

18.TitleEnglish: How to Turn a Toy Lightsaber into a Combat Ready Lightsaber
18.SummaryEnglish: Odin Abbott (Odin Makes & DIY Prop Shop) shows you how to turn a toy lightsaber into a combat ready lightsaber

1.SummaryEnglish: The Mario Kart spike blue shell has been sitting in my background for years, it’s time to make it!

3.TitleEnglish: Sora's Kingdom Key from Kingdom Hearts
3.SummaryEnglish: Kingdom Hearts is one of the few games I have completed more than once, so I thought I would make the Kingdom Key.

4.SummaryEnglish: A decade ago, I made a Boffer version of the Kingdom Keyblade for my son. We went on to make a Halloween Town Sora costume to go with it. Now you can make your own, and battle your Heartless friends

5.SummaryEnglish: n the spirit of April Fools, here is my attempt to make a Grilled Cheese sandwich in the shop.

6.SummaryEnglish: I make a Bioshock Plasmid Bottle from a glass vase, foam and hair gel.

7.SummaryEnglish: I make Thor’s new helmet from the Thor: Ragnarok trailer, with patterns you can download.

8.TitleEnglish: Han Solo's Blaster from Star Wars
8.SummaryEnglish: I make Han Solo’s Blaster from Star Wars, from foam and PVC. No Bothans were harmed in the making of this video.

9.SummaryEnglish: I make a Facehugger from the Alien movies, freehand, no molds or casting! Plus it has wires in it’s legs and tail so it can hug your head.

10.TitleEnglish: Thermal Detonator from Return of the Jedi
10.SummaryEnglish: This is not a typical episode, what this is was my audition submission to be a host on DIY Prop Shop. I removed all the DIY Prop Shop elements, because those guys are cool, and I want to play nice.

11.SummaryEnglish: I have been asked to make a shield many times, Here is my take on two of Wonder Woman's Shields.

12.SummaryEnglish: I make my most requested prop- The Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device. From foam of course.

13.SummaryEnglish: This is one that is constantly requested - Spider Man’s Web Shooters. Based off of the shooters from Captain America: Civil War and Spider-Man: Homecoming.

14.SummaryEnglish: I make Hellboy’s Right Hand of Doom, but it’s not just a glove, this is a puppet hand with articulated fingers

15.TitleEnglish: Sawed-off shotgun from Mad Max and Evil Dead
15.SummaryEnglish: I make a sawn-off double-barrel shotgun, just like the ones used in Mad Max, Evil Dead, Team Fortress 2, and Fallout 4.

16.SummaryEnglish: I make a selection of different swords, all from foam and safe to take into a Con. The idea is easy, and can be applied to most sword/blade/chainsaw shapes.

17.TitleEnglish: The Matrix of Leadership from Transformers: The Movie
17.SummaryEnglish: This time I make the winner of my monthly Patreon poll, and it’s the Matrix of Leadership from Transformers: The Movie. And it separates, just like in the movie.

18.SummaryEnglish: I make a Saiyan Scouter from Dragonball Z. And somehow, I got it to hang on my ear, without a headband! It lights up too.

19.TitleEnglish: Tri Dimensional Chess from Star Trek
19.SummaryEnglish: I am an old school Trekkie. So with the new show Star Trek Discovery out this week, I thought I would make a Tri Dimensional Chess set from the original series of Star trek.

20.SummaryEnglish: I make Hellboy’s Samaritan gun (hand cannon?). This is not just a big hunk of foam, it’s mostly made from styrene plastic, it breaks open, and the cylinder can spin!

21.TitleEnglish: The Infinity Gauntlet, from Avengers: Infinity War
21.SummaryEnglish: I make the Infinity Gauntlet, from Marvel’s Avengers: Infinity War!

22.SummaryEnglish: I make Thor’s hammer Mjolnir, from Marvel’s movie Thor: Ragnarok! (well, Thor: Dark World really)

23.SummaryEnglish: I make Aquaman’s Trident, from the new Justice League movie! And I apologize for getting the math wrong, 17+27 is 44 not 34

24.TitleEnglish: Poe's Helmet from Star Wars: The Last Jedi
24.SummaryEnglish: This time I make Poe’s Helmet, from Star Wars: The Last Jedi

25.SummaryEnglish: This video is a quick build, and I make the T-Virus, from Resident Evil

26.TitleEnglish: Captain Americas Shield from the MCU

1.TitleEnglish: Saruman's Staff from the Lord of the Rings
1.SummaryEnglish: I make Saruman’s Staff from the Lord of the Rings And thank you to Антон Седов for providing reference pictures and measurements.

2.TitleEnglish: Rey's Staff from Star Wars the Last Jedi
2.SummaryEnglish: I make Rey’s Staff from Star Wars: The Force Awakens, The Last Jedi- from his nap.

3.TitleEnglish: Star-lord's Helmet from Guardians of the Galaxy
3.SummaryEnglish: This time I make the highly requested Star-lord Helmet from Guardians of the Galaxy. The helmet I make doesn’t quickly appear out of thin air like in the movies, but I still made it in less than 24 hours!

4.TitleEnglish: The inside of the DeLorean Time Machine from Back to the Future
4.SummaryEnglish: I get to make the inside of the Back to the Future DeLorean! Now I can sit inside, and I don’t need to go to the OASIS to do it!

5.SummaryEnglish: I make Jason's Machete with a cutout, so if you take pictures with people, it will look like you are cutting them up!

6.TitleEnglish: Captain America's new shields from Avengers: Infinity War
6.SummaryEnglish: I make Captain America's new Wakandan shields from Avengers: Infinity War (episode is spoiler-free) And this time, I make the prop without any power tools!

7.TitleEnglish: Thor’s Stormbreaker from Avengers: Infinity War
7.SummaryEnglish: I make Thor’s new axe Stormbreaker from Avengers: Infinity War I made this prop before I saw the movie, I only had pictures of the toys to work from!

8.TitleEnglish: Leviathan Axe from God of War 4
8.SummaryEnglish: I make Kratos’ new Leviathan Axe from God of War 4. And it lights up!

9.SummaryEnglish: I make the Barbasol Cryogenics Containment Unit (Cryocan) from Jurassic Park

10.TitleEnglish: Ant-Man's Helmet from Ant-Man and the Wasp
10.SummaryEnglish: I make Ant-Man’s Helmet from Ant-Man and the Wasp!

11.SummaryEnglish: I make Loki’s Helmet from Thor Ragnarok!

12.SummaryEnglish: I make the Pip-Boy 3000 mk IV from Fallout 4, and it’s going to be part of a cosplay at DragonCon!

13.SummaryEnglish: I make the Super Sledge from Fallout 4, and it’s going to be part of QuikSilvaBabe’s cosplay at DragonCon!

14.TitleEnglish: Big Blaster inspired by Guardians of the Galaxy
14.SummaryEnglish: I make a giant blaster, much like the type Rocket builds on screen in Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy.

15.SummaryEnglish: I make a Magic: The Gathering artifact card come to life!

16.SummaryEnglish: I make the Fourth Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver, WITHOUT FOAM!

17.TitleEnglish: Freddy Krueger's Glove from A Nightmare on Elm Street
17.SummaryEnglish: This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I made the iconic Freddy Glove from plastic, spray paint, and other random objects.

18.TitleEnglish: Thor's Sakaarian swords from Thor: Ragnarok
18.SummaryEnglish: This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I make the Dual swords from Thor's gladiator battle with the Hulk in Thor: Ragnarok.

19.TitleEnglish: Blades of Chaos from God of War
19.SummaryEnglish: I make the Blades of Chaos from God of War. This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I made a set of the Blades of Chaos from EVA foam and some paint.

20.TitleEnglish: The helmet of Thanos from Avengers: Infinity War and Endgame
20.SummaryEnglish: I make the The helmet of Thanos from Avengers: Infinity War, and you can see it in the new Avengers: Endgame teaser trailer!

1.TitleEnglish: Bumblebee's head from the new Transformers movie- Bumblebee
1.SummaryEnglish: I make a helmet that looks like the head of Bumblebee as seen in the new Bumblebee movie! This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I made the helmet from EVA foam and some paint. No big power tools used this time, just a sander, heat gun, and a Dremel.

2.TitleEnglish: LEGO Batman Armor from LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
2.SummaryEnglish: This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I made my LEGO Batman shoulder pads from Apocolypseburg, as seen in the new movie LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part.

3.TitleEnglish: LEGO Batman Helmet from LEGO Movie 2
3.SummaryEnglish: This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I made my LEGO Batman helmet from Apocolypseburg, as seen in the new movie LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part. This is the second video for my Lego Batman.

4.SummaryEnglish: This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I made my Captain Marvel helmet as seen in the new MCU Captain Marvel movie!

5.SummaryEnglish: This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I made a miniature Stonehenge replica, just like the one from the movie Spinal Tap.

6.TitleEnglish: Mera's Trident from the Aquaman comic books
6.SummaryEnglish: This DIY tutorial video will show you step by step how I improved my trident method to make a trident fit for Mera, Queen of Atlantis

8.TitleEnglish: Thanos' new weapon from Avengers: Endgame
8.SummaryEnglish: I make Thanos' new double bladed sword from Avengers: Endgame, from EVA foam and PVC.

9.TitleEnglish: Power Sword from He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
9.SummaryEnglish: I make He-Man's Power Sword, from EVA foam and PVC.

10.TitleEnglish: Iron Man's Nano Gauntlet from Avengers: Endgame
10.SummaryEnglish: This video will show you step by step how I make the Nano Gauntlet as seen in the Marvel's Avengers: Endgame- with only one power tool: A Dremel!

11.TitleEnglish: Captain America's Broken Shield from Avengers: Endgame
11.SummaryEnglish: I break Captain America's shield, just like it was in Avengers: Endgame! I should modify more older props!

12.SummaryEnglish: This video will show you step by step how I make my own Sword of Omens as seen in the original Thundercats- HO!

13.TitleEnglish: The Tesseract from the Avengers Movies
13.SummaryEnglish: I make the Cosmic Cube (or Tesseract), using a plastic box and some LEDs.

14.TitleEnglish: Tesseract Containment System PART 1 from The Avengers
14.SummaryEnglish: This is PART 1! I need more time to get this monster finished, it will be up next. I make the Tesseract Containment System, as seen in the first Avengers movie. I needed SOMETHING for my Cosmic Cube to sit in.

15.TitleEnglish: Tesseract Containment System PART 2 from The Avengers
15.SummaryEnglish: I finish the Tesseract Containment System, as seen in the first Avengers movie. I needed SOMETHING for my Cosmic Cube to sit in.

16.TitleEnglish: Maleficent's Horns from Maleficent Mistress of Evil
16.SummaryEnglish: How I made my set of Maleficent horns, as inspired by the live action Maleficent and Maleficent: Mistress of Evil movies. This video features step by step instructions

17.TitleEnglish: My own historically inaccurate Viking Helmet
17.SummaryEnglish: This video features step by step instructions on how I made my own historically inaccurate and slightly cartoony, viking helmet with exaggerated horns.

18.TitleEnglish: Brook's crown hat from One Piece
18.SummaryEnglish: I make Brook's Soul King hat from One Piece! Because let's face it - Brook is awesome!

19.TitleEnglish: Jason's Hockey Mask from Friday the 13th
19.SummaryEnglish: I make my own Jason Vorhees hockey mask, pattern made from a recast of a movie used mask!

20.TitleEnglish: The Mandalorian Phase Pulse Blaster - Star Wars
20.SummaryEnglish: I make the Mandalorian's Amban Phase Pulse Blaster, as seen in the new Mandalorian series on DIsney+! Star Wars blasters!

21.TitleEnglish: Professor Xavier's Cerebro Helmet from X-Men: House of X
21.SummaryEnglish: I make the new walkaround Cerebro helmet, as seen on Professor Charles Xavier in the new X-Men comics House of X and Power of X.

22.SummaryEnglish: I make Ronin’s new sword from Avengers: Endgame. Or is it Hawkeye’s sword? It’s the same guy, it’s just one has a hoodie...

23.TitleEnglish: Grandmaster's Melt Stick from Thor Ragnarok

24.SummaryEnglish: I make the Zangetsu sword from the Bleach anime.

25.TitleEnglish: Red Guardian's Helmet from the Black Widow movie
25.SummaryEnglish: I make Red Guardian's helmet as seen in the new Black Widow movie trailer

26.TitleEnglish: Geralt's sword Aerondight from the Witcher
26.SummaryEnglish: I make the sword Aerondight as seen in the Witcher video game series. It's "light, sharp as foam, and fits the hand neatly"

27.SummaryEnglish: I make Nightmare’s sword Soul Edge as seen in Soulcalibur II video game. This was a build voted on by my Patrons on Patreon. I will have a new poll in January!

1.TitleEnglish: Heavy Infantry Helmet from The Mandalorian
1.SummaryEnglish: Mandalorian helmets!! I make the Heavy Infantry helmet from the Disney + Star Wars show The Mandalorian.

2.TitleEnglish: The Darksaber from Star Wars at Dallas Makerspace
2.SummaryEnglish: I make a Star Wars Darksaber with the help of Luke Andraski and Max Kirkland at Dallas Makerspace. It's an all aluminum hilt with a polycarbonate blade! This is the way.

3.TitleEnglish: Bakugo Gauntlets from My Hero Academia
3.SummaryEnglish: The big green gauntlets as worn by Katsuki Bakugo in My Hero Academia! Gloves too.

4.TitleEnglish: Eye of Agamotto from Doctor Strange
4.SummaryEnglish: I make the Eye of Agamotto from Marvel's Doctor Strange and Avengers: Infinity War! 3D printed on my AnyCubic Photon printer

5.TitleEnglish: RX-78-2 Head Unit from Mobile Suit Gundam
5.SummaryEnglish: I make the Head Unit from an RX-78-2 Gundam, and I made it like a helmet you can wear!

6.TitleEnglish: Shota Aizawa's Eraser Head Goggles from My Hero Academia
6.SummaryEnglish: In this DIY video I show you how I make the yellow goggles as worn by Shota Aizawa in My Hero Academia! No promises on being able to stop someone's quirk...

7.SummaryEnglish: In this DIY video I make a Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator, or Gravity Gun FROM SCRATCH! I love Half-Life, Half-Life 2, and I am looking forward to Half-Life Alyx, as we inch ever closer to the all-time elusive Half-Life 3!

8.SummaryEnglish: I make the Body Unit from an RX-78-2 Gundam, the begining of a full body cosplay you can wear!

9.SummaryEnglish: I make the frozen Arendelle sword from Frozen 2! In the movie, Elsa made the sword, and Anna wielded it. I made this sword for my friends at League For Hope.

10.TitleEnglish: Captain Rex Phase II helmet from Star Wars: the Clone Wars
10.SummaryEnglish: I am enjoying the final season of Clone Wars on Disney+, so I made a Captain Rex Phase II helmet out of EVA foam!

11.TitleEnglish: My own Sci-Fi helmet, painted with PlaidFX paints
11.SummaryEnglish: I was asked to make my own Sci-Fi helmet, and paint it with PlaidFX paints, and here it is! The idea of the helmet is that it is a utilitarian base, with additional things to be attached.

12.SummaryEnglish: I make the backpack unit for my full suit RX-78-2 Gundam Cosplay.

13.TitleEnglish: What if... Odin Bakes, Stakes, Breaks, Wakes...
13.SummaryEnglish: It's April Fool's day! And this video we explore what could have happened if Odin Makes was called something else....

14.TitleEnglish: Custom Body form for sewing and armor making
14.SummaryEnglish: I get help from Felicia Cowley (SMOSH) with making a body form, or sewing dummy, cast from my friend, The Mighty Thorcules. She has used the same technique to make a sewing form of herself, but full body!

17.TitleEnglish: the wizard staff from the Pixar movie Onward
17.SummaryEnglish: I make Ian Lightfoot's wizard staff from Pixar's Onward! With a removable Phoenix Gem.

18.TitleEnglish: Cloud's Buster Sword from Final Fantasy VII
18.SummaryEnglish: I make Cloud's Iconic Buster Sword, with details patterned after the art in the 2020 remake.

19.SummaryEnglish: I make the new Super Shotgun from Doom Eternal, with the meat hook! Full DIY video on making a non-functional replica from a video game.

20.TitleEnglish: arms for the full suit Gundam RX-78-2 cosplay
20.SummaryEnglish: I make the arm unit for my full suit RX-78-2 Gundam Cosplay. Full jointed arms , shoulders, and armored hands!

21.TitleEnglish: Tech's Helmet from Star Wars the Clone Wars
21.SummaryEnglish: I make Tech's Helmet, he is a member of the Bad Batch, an elite clone strike force from the animated series Star Wars the Clone Wars.

22.TitleEnglish: Midoriya's Deku Mask from My Hero Academia
22.SummaryEnglish: I make Izuku Midoriya's Deku mask, from EVA foam, without using any power tools! In this video I will show you step by step how I made Deku's Mask as seen in My Hero Academia Two Heroes. The only tools i used were hobby knives, rulers, sandpaper, paintbrush, and a special hole making tool.

23.TitleEnglish: Bane's mask from the Dark Knight Rises
23.SummaryEnglish: I make Bane's Venom mask from Christopher Nolan's Batman movie: The Dark Knight Rises! In this video I will show you step by step how I made Bane's mask. The only power tools I used were my belt sander and my rotary tool.

24.TitleEnglish: Feet for the RX-78-2 Gundam cosplay
24.SummaryEnglish: I make the feet for the full suit Gundam cosplay project. With 16 CM of lift, these are the solid feet for the RX-78-2 Gundam Cosplay.

25.SummaryEnglish: I make Eivor's 'left hand' ax from Assassin's Creed Valhalla. In this video I show you step by step how I made a viking ax from EVA foam with a wooden handle

26.TitleEnglish: Magic the Gathering spellbook with Secret Lair
26.SummaryEnglish: I make custom MTG Spellbooks to carry your decks in. Each one has a different cover and method to be securely closed.

27.TitleEnglish: Heimdall's Bifrost Sword from Marvel's Thor
27.SummaryEnglish: I make Heimdall's sword Hofund, or the Bifrost sword. It has a mash up of details from Thor and Thor: The Dark World- and it is made from EVA foam!

28.TitleEnglish: RX-78-2 Gundam cosplay full body with legs!
28.SummaryEnglish: I make the leg unit for my full suit RX-78-2 Gundam Cosplay. A full suit! Completed Gundam! Just needs armament next...

29.TitleEnglish: Gamora's Godslayer sword from Guardians of the Galaxy
29.SummaryEnglish: I show you step by step how I made my cosplay Gamora sword, from EVA foam. GOTG, Infinity War, GOTG2, Avengers Endgame

30.TitleEnglish: the Curse Crusher from Pixar's movie Onward
30.SummaryEnglish: I make Corey the Manticore's sword Curse Crsher from Pixar's Onward! In this video I show you step by step how I made my Curse Crusher sword from EVA foam.

31.TitleEnglish: Black Panther face mask from Captain America - Civil War
31.SummaryEnglish: I make a Black Panther face mask, based on the helmet seen in Captain America: Civil War. Cosplay everywhere wearing a face mask! In this video I show you step by step how I made my Black Panther inspired face mask from EVA foam.

32.TitleEnglish: Lando Calrissian's skiff guard helmet from Return of the Jedi
32.SummaryEnglish: I make a Lando Calrissian skiff guard helmet from EVA foam and latex rubber. I love the rubber monsters, the side pieces are fun for me to build!

33.TitleEnglish: Beam Saber for the full suit RX-78-2 Gundam cosplay
33.SummaryEnglish: I make a light up Beam Saber for my full suit RX-78-2 Gundam cosplay. And talk about other Lightsabers I have built.

34.TitleEnglish: Valkyrie's sword from the Marvel movie Thor: Ragnarok
34.SummaryEnglish: In this video I show step by step how I make Dragonfang, the sword of the Valkyries as seen in the Marvel movie Thor: Ragnarok

35.TitleEnglish: Barret Wallace arm cannon from Final Fantasy VII
35.SummaryEnglish: In this video I show step by step how I make Barret's arm weapon from Final Fantasy VII

36.TitleEnglish: War Machine Helmet from Avengers: Infinity War
36.SummaryEnglish: In this video I show step by step how I make War Machine's helmet as seen in Avengers: Infinity War and Avengers: Endgame

37.TitleEnglish: The Shield for my full suit RX-78-2 Gundam cosplay
37.SummaryEnglish: In this video I show step by step how I make a human sized Gundam shield, based off of a Real Grade RX-78-2 Gunpla shield!

38.TitleEnglish: Deku's Air Force Gloves from My Hero Academia
38.SummaryEnglish: I make Izuku Midoriya's Air Force Gloves, from EVA foam, without using any power tools! In this video I will show you step by step how I made Deku's new Air Force Gloves as seen in My Hero Academia season 4. The only tools I needed were hobby knives, rulers, tape, paintbrush, and some contact cement.

39.TitleEnglish: Odin's Spear Gungnir as seen in the Marvel Thor movies
39.SummaryEnglish: I make Odin's spear Gungnir as seen in the Marvel movies Thor and Thor: the Dark World. In this video I will show you step by step how I made Odin's golden spear Gungnir as seen in the MCU.

40.TitleEnglish: Vegeta Super Saiyan Hair from Dragon Ball Z
40.SummaryEnglish: I make Vegeta's Super Saiyan hair from Dragon Ball Z! In this video I show step by step how I made a Super Saiyan hair wig from EVA foam.

41.TitleEnglish: ARC Trooper helmet from Star Wars: The Clone Wars
41.SummaryEnglish: I make an ARC Trooper helmet from Star Wars: The Clone Wars In this tutorial show how I make a phase II ARC Trooper helmet by modifying my Captain Rex pattern. The helmet is made from EVA foam.

42.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make the main Beam Weapon for the full suit RX-78-2 Gundam cosplay.

43.TitleEnglish: the Among Us spacesuit - it's an inflatable cosplay!
43.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make an inflatable suit that looks like one of the Among Us astronauts. Inflatable? yes! Just like those T-Rex costumes.

44.SummaryEnglish: "Let's get DANGEROUS!" ~D.W. In this video I show step by step how I made Darkwing Duck's Gas Gun as seen in Disney's Duck Tales! It's made from EVA foam and PVC.

45.TitleEnglish: A Vault-Tec Vault Dweller from Fallout 76
45.SummaryEnglish: I make a full Vault-Tec Vault Suit cosplay in partnership with Party City, including a PipBoy repaint and a rocket propelled sledgehammer! IN ONE WEEKEND with the help of my friends, Felicia Cowley and Joseph Grasso.

46.TitleEnglish: Ash's right hand from Ash vs. the Evil Dead
46.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make Ash William's mechanical right hand as seen in the show Ash vs. the Evil Dead. I show step by step the methods and problems I had with building a replica hand from costume gloves, parts form the hardware store, and EVA foam.

47.TitleEnglish: Among Us inflatable costume update! New visor, better feet and hands!
47.SummaryEnglish: In this video I update and improve my inflatable suit that looks like one of the Among Us astronauts. I add pass through feet, a reflective visor, and better hand holes!

48.TitleEnglish: Black Knight helmet from Monty Python and the Holy Grail
48.SummaryEnglish: I make the Black Knights helmet and tunic in partnership with Michael's craft stores and Cosplay Central! Big thank you to CosplayCentral.com for setting this challenge up!

49.TitleEnglish: Mechagodzilla head from Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla
49.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make the head from the 1974 version of Mechagodzilla, also known in the states as the Bionic Monster and the Cosmic Monster. This has always been my favorite version of MG, and probably my favorite Toho monster! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with building a replica kaiju head from Truck lights and EVA foam.

50.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make one of Sub-Zero's masks from Mortal Kombat 11. I show step by step the way that I made my own Sub-Zero mask from EVA foam.

51.TitleEnglish: The Lich King helmet from World of Warcraft
51.SummaryEnglish: I make the Helmet of Domination from World of Warcraft, and it's all EVA foam! Joe was a major contributor to this build, and I wanna say thank you for all of your help and suggestions! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with building a replica Lich King helm free form from EVA foam.

52.TitleEnglish: Bo-Katan Kryze helmet as seen in the Mandalorian
52.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make Bo-Katan's Mandalorian helmet with her signature Nite Owls design. I show step by step the way that I made my own Mandalorian helmet from EVA foam. More Star Wars helmets FTW!

53.TitleEnglish: Tokoyami's Dark Shadow from My Hero Academia
53.SummaryEnglish: Fumikage Tokoyami has an awesome quirk: Dark Shadow With the help of my friend Skylen Fail, we make a small inflatable Dark Shadow that can be worn under Tokoyami's cloak for cosplay

54.TitleEnglish: Imperial Combat Assault Transport Helmet from The Mandalorian & Star Wars: Rogue One
54.SummaryEnglish: This week, I show you how I made a Juggernaut Driver Helmet, otherwise known as the Imperial Combat Assault Transport Pilot Helmet as seen in The Mandalorian and Star Wars: Rogue One.

55.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make the Thermal Katana from Cyberpunk 2077! I will show you step by step, just how I went about making one of the 'coolest' weapons that isn't quite in the Cyberpunk game! As of Dec 2020, it's still not in the game....

56.TitleEnglish: The Neck section of my 1974 Mechagodzilla cosplay
56.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make the neck from the 1974 version of Mechagodzilla, also known in the states as the Bionic Monster and the Cosmic Monster. This has always been my favorite version of MG, and probably my favorite Toho monster! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with fitting a replica kaiju head to a wearable helmet and neck assembly that is all made from EVA foam.

1.TitleEnglish: My Mechagodzilla cosplay chest build part 1
1.SummaryEnglish: This video is part 1 of my make of the chest from the 1974 version of Mechagodzilla, also known in the states as the Bionic Monster and the Cosmic Monster. This has always been my favorite version of MG, and probably my favorite Toho monster! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with creating a form fitting chest piece, then cover it with foam to replicate a kaiju chest- all to add to a wearable suit that is made from EVA foam.

2.TitleEnglish: My Mechagodzilla cosplay chest build part 2
2.SummaryEnglish: This video is part 2 of my make of the chest from the 1974 version of Mechagodzilla, also known in the states as the Bionic Monster and the Cosmic Monster. This has always been my favorite version of MG, and probably my favorite Toho monster! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with creating a form fitting chest piece, then cover it with foam to replicate a kaiju chest- all to add to a wearable suit that is made from EVA foam.

3.TitleEnglish: The Mandalorian's Beskar spear as seen in Disney's The Mandalorian
3.SummaryEnglish: Another Star Wars prop! From my favorite Star Wars show! (there have been a few over the years...) In this video I show my full process for figuring out how to build a PVC Beskar spear, without the use of my big power tools- I only use a rotary tool (and a heat gun) that's it! Is it easy? Kinda is- it just took a little more time

4.TitleEnglish: the Ray Gun wonder weapon from Call of Duty Zombies
4.SummaryEnglish: This time I build a very requested prop- the Ray Gun from Call of Duty! This Wonder Weapon is featured on every COD Zombie map, but it has appeared in many other COD games. I make mine from EVA foam and LEDs, and this video takes you through the steps I did to make one from scratch!

5.TitleEnglish: King Kong’s new axe as seen in Godzilla vs. Kong
5.SummaryEnglish: King Kong has a never before seen axe in the new Godzilla vs. Kong movie!! You can see it in the new trailer for the movie- so I made one from EVA foam!! The Godzilla spines light up blue too.

6.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make one of Scorpion's masks from Mortal Kombat 11. I show step by step the way that I made my own Scorpion mask from EVA foam.

7.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make arms for my cosplay of the 1974 version of Mechagodzilla, also known in the states as the Bionic Monster and the Cosmic Monster. This has always been my favorite version of MG, and probably my favorite Toho monster! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with building replica robotic kaiju arms from vinyl fabric and EVA foam

8.TitleEnglish: Monster hands for my full suit 1974 Mechagodzilla cosplay
8.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make hands for my cosplay of the 1974 version of Mechagodzilla, also known in the states as the Bionic Monster and the Cosmic Monster. This has always been my favorite version of MG, and probably my favorite Toho monster! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with building replica robotic kaiju parts from vinyl fabric and EVA foam.

9.TitleEnglish: Din Djarin's Beskar helmet from The Mandalorian
9.SummaryEnglish: A requested Star Wars prop! From my favorite Star Wars show! (there have been a few over the years...) In this video I make the Mandalorian's helmet- from a pattern supplied by one of my patrons from Patreon!

10.TitleEnglish: Wanda's new Scarlet Witch Headdress from Wandavision
10.SummaryEnglish: A new Marvel MCU prop! From the new show Wandavision, it's the Scarlet Witch headdress made from EVA foam! In this video I take you though the steps I did to make my own Scarlet Witch mask- from cutting the raw foam to final painting.

11.TitleEnglish: the winter Soldier mask from Captain America: The Winter Soldier
11.SummaryEnglish: More Marvel MCU props! Inspired by the new show Falcon and the Winter Soldier, here is the Winter Soldier mask made from EVA foam! In this video I take you though the steps I did to make my own Winter Soldier mask- from cutting the raw foam to final painting.

12.TitleEnglish: Red Ranger Power Sword from Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
12.SummaryEnglish: Today I finally make a prop from Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers, and it's made from EVA foam! It's the classic Red Ranger Power Sword, complete with coin, as supplied by a Joe Hoard!

13.TitleEnglish: 1974 Mechagodzilla cosplay suit head and neck upgrade
13.SummaryEnglish: In this video I upgrade elements of my version of the 1974 Mechagodzilla, also known in the states as the Bionic Monster and the Cosmic Monster. This has always been my favorite version of MG, and probably my favorite Toho monster! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with improving the neck swivel, and making the mouth articulated. You can also read about my Mechagodzilla build in this month's new Kaiju Ramen Magazine!

14.TitleEnglish: The Razor Crest from the Mandalorian
14.SummaryEnglish: Spring is here! It's April First!! And today I thought I would make the Mandalorian's trusty ship: The Razor Crest. I show step by step the methods and problems I had with improving the neck swivel, and making the mouth articulated. You can also read about my Mechagodzilla build in this month's new Kaiju Ramen Magazine!

15.TitleEnglish: the Flag Smashers mask from Marvel's The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
15.SummaryEnglish: This could be the easiest villain to cosplay from the MCU! Inspired by the new show The Falcon and the Winter Soldier, here is the Flag Smashers mask made from EVA foam! In this video I take you though the steps I did to make my own Flag Smashers mask- from cutting the raw foam to final painting. I show step by step the methods and problems I had with improving the neck swivel, and making the mouth articulated. You can also read about my Mechagodzilla build in this month's new Kaiju Ramen Magazine!

16.TitleEnglish: Baron Zemo mask from The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
16.SummaryEnglish: Even more Marvel MCU props! Inspired by the new show Falcon and the Winter Soldier, here is Baron Zemo's mask made from EVA foam! In this video I take you though the steps I did to make my own Baron Zemo mask- from cutting the raw foam to final painting. I show step by step the methods and problems I had with improving the neck swivel, and making the mouth articulated. You can also read about my Mechagodzilla build in this month's new Kaiju Ramen Magazine!

17.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make the lower body for my version of the 1974 Mechagodzilla, also known in the states as the Bionic Monster and the Cosmic Monster. This has always been my favorite version of MG, and probably my favorite Toho monster! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with making a pair of robotic Daisy Duke shorts. You can also read about my Mechagodzilla build in this month's new Kaiju Ramen Magazine! I show step by step the methods and problems I had with improving the neck swivel, and making the mouth articulated. You can also read about my Mechagodzilla build in this month's new Kaiju Ramen Magazine!

18.TitleEnglish: Rebel Base Build: Endor Rebel trooper helmet from Return of the Jedi
18.SummaryEnglish: A full collaboration video with the Rebel Base Build! We make the Endor Rebel Trooper helmet from Return of the Jedi. This helmet is fabric, 3D printed, and foam. AND it is 100% created from scratch, by us!

19.TitleEnglish: The Reality Stone container with Anycubic Wash & Cure Plus
19.SummaryEnglish: This time I make the Aether box, or Reality Stone container from Thor: the Dark World. I make this using Anycubic's New Wash & Cure Plus, which is a much appreciated streamlining to my resin printing workflow

20.TitleEnglish: Helmet from Zack Snyder's Army of the Dead
20.SummaryEnglish: I make the zombie headpiece as seen in the new Netflix movie Army of the Dead. It's also in the trailer for the movie, this video is spoiler free!

21.SummaryEnglish: I make the Omnitrix as seen in the very first episode of Ben 10! It's a fan favorite that has been requested for years, and I make it in this video. I show you step by step just how I created my patterns and made my very own Omnitrix just like the one Ben Tennyson had.

22.TitleEnglish: Black Widow's Gauntlets from Captain America Civil War
22.SummaryEnglish: I make a set of Black Widow's Bite, the electroshock bracers that she wears in the movie Captain America: Civil War. Made entirely of EVA foam, without power tools, this one day project is fun and easy to do! It's a fan favorite that has been requested for years, and I make it in this video. I show you step by step just how I created my patterns and made my very own Omnitrix just like the one Ben Tennyson had.

23.SummaryEnglish: I make the Mind Stone container, or the Chitauri staff as seen in Marvel's Avengers! In this video I show you how I made my Loki Scepter out of EVA foam and a 3D printed blue gem. Joe Grasso was on hand to give me lots of help too.It's a fan favorite that has been requested for years, and I make it in this video. I show you step by step just how I created my patterns and made my very own Omnitrix just like the one Ben Tennyson had.

24.TitleEnglish: Close Shave harvesting tool from Fortnite
24.SummaryEnglish: Fornite calls it "A stylish pickaxe with bolt on tips." I say it's a fun and easy prop to make from PVC and EVA foam! In this video I show you step by step (with side by side video!) exactly how I made my version of this rare harvesting tool from the video game Fortnite. The footage I used to make this video was originally shot for use as one of my Tik Tok videos. Instead of a sliver of vertical video, I decided to do a full side by side video, using both angles at the same time.

25.TitleEnglish: Legs for my full suit cosplay of the 1974 Mechagodzilla
25.SummaryEnglish: I make the main leg pieces for my 1974 Showa era Mechagodzilla cosplay! And make some corrections for things on the pelvis that really bothered me. Countdown to full suit: end of August 2021!

26.SummaryEnglish: This time I make the the TVA Time Baton as seen in the new Loki series on Disney+! This may be the first prop I have made fully creating the original files in addition to 3D printing. With PVC pipe and a flashlight.

27.SummaryEnglish: I make Sylvie's Sword as seen in the new Loki series on Disney+! Made from EVA foam, this is as faithful a reproduction as I could get- perfect for your various needs!

28.SummaryEnglish: Today I make a foam version of Miss Minutes! It's the TVA mascot standing on my desk! Then I made a second version of her using my shop clock!

29.SummaryEnglish: I make another MotU prop! It's Skeletor's staff or the Havoc staff, made from EVA foam and PVC! In this video I show you step by step how I made my replica of Skeletor's staff, without any major power tools! The real skull and horns were loaned to me from the collection of professormojave. Find him on Instagram

30.SummaryEnglish: I make the feet for my 1974 Showa era Mechagodzilla cosplay! Next Mechagodzilla video will be the tail and painting!! Concrunch to full suit: end of August 2021! Sacanime 2021!

31.TitleEnglish: Full Suit RX-78-2 Gundam Cosplay Alterations & Weathering
31.SummaryEnglish: In this video we make alterations to the RX-78-2 Gundam cosplay to get it ready for con season! These improvements included: updated the look of the visor, greater helmet ventilation including installation of a cooling fan, rebuild of the knee joints, shortening of the forearms, and suspension of the lower half of the costume from the shoulders via harness for greater articulation. The costume was then expertly weathered with a variety of airbrush and handpainting techniques.

32.TitleEnglish: Spore of Starro mind control mask
32.SummaryEnglish: I loved the new movie 'The Suicide Squad!' So this time I make a Starro mind control starfish, or a spore of Starro. I show you how I made my Starro parasite as a mask from EVA foam, screen door, and a cat toy!

33.SummaryEnglish: In the new episode of Marvel's What If... Agent Carter becomes Captain Carter, and Howard Stark gives her her own shield! In this video I make my own version of Captain Carter's shield, made from HD Foam.

34.SummaryEnglish: In this video I make the brand new Neo Vanguard lance from Dungeon Fighter Online from EVA foam. I will show you step by step just how I did it!

35.SummaryEnglish: Today we make a light up Deepslate Redstone Ore from Minecraft to announce my new Minecraft server available to Patrons!

36.SummaryEnglish: In this video I finish my 1974 Mechagodzilla cosplay- and I take a walk around SacAnime Summer 2021! Mechagodzilla is on the con floor!
